title: Apple now selling M1 Pro/Max MacBook Pros via official Refurbished Store
content:
Today, Apple is bringing the latest M1 Pro and M1 Max MacBooks to its official Certified Refurbished Storefront. Marking the first time we’ve seen first-party cash discounts on the new releases, you can now save $200 or more across both 14- and 16-inch MacBook Pros running the latest chips that Apple Silicon has to offer.

more…

The post Apple now selling M1 Pro/Max MacBook Pros via official Refurbished Store appeared first on 9to5Mac.
